column4: Here it goes, i'm running a dual, windows 7, and ubuntu 12.04, and my internet for ubuntu isn't working. My network card is a  Intel® Centrino® Wireless-N 1030, when log on to ubuntu the internet works for a couple of seconds (enoguh to load a page) then cuts out complety even though its still connected.
have you taken a look of the output of dmesg?
did you take a look at dmesg -output?
